import React,{ useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' var count; const info = { cAddress:'', description:'', amount:'', recipient:'', donors:'', voters:'', completed:'' } const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const [reqValue,setReqValue] = useState([]); localStorage.setItem('count','count') const requestInfo=async()=>{ let f=localStorage.getItem('count') info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(f).call(); info.map(async(e) => { setReqValue([{...reqValue}, { cAddress:info[6], description:info[5], amount:props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[1]), recipient:info[2], donors:info[4], voters:info[3], completed:info[0] } ]) }) count++; setValue([...value,count]); } useEffect(()=>{ requestInfo(); },[props.refresh]) return (
{console.log("request value-",reqValue)} {console.log(props.contract)} Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed { reqValue.map((e,index)=>( {index} {e.cAddress} {e.description} {e.amount} {e.recipient} {e.voters}/{e.donors} {e.completed} )) } {/* {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {index} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} {completed} ) )} */}
) } export default ShowRequest
